>
[Performance Weapon Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=2216) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing](/Sources.aspx?ID=48) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Provocator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=87)

**Prerequisites**
[Provocator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2211); expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack

</column>

---

Your experience has made you better with a wide variety of weapons. Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert, as does your proficiency rank for your chosen advanced weapon.
name: Performance Weapon Expert
prerequisite: Provocator Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
